corpus.description: Texts from Nuclear Threat Initiative website, created by Center for Non-Proliferation Studies
corpus.name: NTI

document.description: Berlitz Where to Go in Hong Kong
document.name: WhereToHongKong

sentence.text: IAEA chief El Baradei indicated that signing the Protocol would ensure IAEA oversight over Libya 's nuclear transition from weapons creation to peaceful purposes .

During the IAEA 's visit to Iran , Iranian officials indicated that Iran would honor its safeguards agreement with the IAEA , but did not clearly indicate Iran 's willingness to accept the Additional Protocol .
Another report indicates that `` Iran has ... conducted extensive research on more lethal active agents like anthrax , hoof and mouth disease , and biotoxins . ''

Reports indicate that Iran has approached Pakistan for help in enriching uranium imported from South Africa in the late 1980's . Rumors that Pakistan is helping Iran develop nuclear weapons persist ( 7198 ) .

During the IAEA 's visit to Iran , Iranian officials indicated that Iran would honor its safeguards agreement with the IAEA , but did not clearly indicate Iran 's willingness to accept the Additional Protocol .

North Korea has not conducted a nuclear test , but in early May 2005 , press reports indicated that U.S. satellite imagery had detected signs that North Korea could be preparing for a nuclear test to be conducted in June .

Reports by defectors and other accounts in the open literature indicate that North Korea currently possesses blister ( e.g. , mustard ) , nerve ( e.g. , sarin ) , choking ( e.g. , phosgene ) , and blood agents ( e.g. , hydrogen cyanide ) .
The popular phrase `` Soon come '' indicates an apparent lack of concern about time and an unhurried attitude to daily tasks .
Archaeologists indicate that Lamma has probably been inhabited for some 4,000 years , and the island is known as `` Hong Kong 's Stone Age Island . ''
